content.raw:
The round names and task data were modified to follow the changes introduced by [this PR](#!/osrf/cloudsim-sim/pull-requests/63/update-src-monitor-with-new-task-and-score/diff). That PR should be merged before this one.

After the changes of the clickable headers and rounds, is the UI ok @chapulina ?

Screenshot using hardcoded mock data that followed the JSON results of the PR:

![screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496671948161.png](https://bitbucket.org/repo/oyRq5d/images/9770024-screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496671948161.png 'screencapture-localhost-8080-src-results-1496671948161.png')
